name: Petz Dolphinz Encounter
description:
Play as a new member of the Ocean Rescue Team, and explore the seas and oceans on board the Delphis submarine. Rescue, swim and interact with dolphins and other sea creatures while you build relationships with them!

Help rescue endangered animals in different environments:

Rescue dolphins from polluted environments while you fulfill various ecological missions

Travel through eight different seas and oceans of the world, from the Mediterranean Sea to the Arctic Ocean

Swim with and take care of a variety of dolphins:

Swim with Dolphinz to learn about a variety of them from oceans all over the world: identify their species, photograph them, and try to get close enough to pet them!

Take care of Dolphinz that have been hurt by different large objects or trapped in nets; treat their wounds and cure them

Learn about submarine life:

Become an expert of the submarine world by using an amazing set of submarine equipment to watch and take photographs of sea creatures

Learn about more than 50 different sea creatures, from dolphins to whales to sea turtles

Deep-dive and search for hidden treasures; find the best way to extract them without causing damage

Use your Nintendo DSi™ Camera to put yourself in the game and become a member of the Team:

Take a picture of yourself with the Nintendo DSi Camera to put yourself into the game and become a true member of the Ocean Rescue Team
